Uses of Class
org.apache.freemarker.core.Configuration

  • Packages that use Configuration 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)
    org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver
    Template lookup, loading, and caching: Base classes/interfaces
    org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver.impl
    Template lookup, loading and caching: Standard implementations.
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet
    Servlet for legacy "Model 2" frameworks that allows using FreeMarker templates instead of JSP as the MVC View (see in the Manual), also custom JSP tag support.

    • Uses of Configuration in org.apache.freemarker.core

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration Template.getConfiguration()
      Returns the Configuration object associated with this template.
      Configuration Environment.getConfiguration() 
      Configuration TemplateConfiguration.getParentConfiguration()
      Returns the parent Configuration, or null if none was associated yet.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core with parameters of type Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Template Template.createPlainTextTemplate(String name, String content, Configuration config)
      Same as Template.createPlainTextTemplate(String, String, String, Configuration, String) with null sourceName argument.
      static Template Template.createPlainTextTemplate(String name, String sourceName, String content, Configuration config, String encoding)
      Creates a Template that only contains a single block of static text, no dynamic content.
      Object CustomAttribute.get(Configuration cfg)
      Gets the value of a Configuration-scope attribute from the given Configuration.
      void CustomAttribute.set(Object value, Configuration cfg)
      Sets the value of a Configuration-scope attribute in the given Configuration.
      void TemplateConfiguration.setParentConfiguration(Configuration cfg)
      Associates this instance with a Configuration; usually you don't call this, as it's called internally when this instance is added to a Configuration.
      Constructors in org.apache.freemarker.core with parameters of type Configuration 
      Constructor and Description
      Template(String name, Reader reader, Configuration cfg)
      Same as Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration) with null sourceName parameter.
      Template(String name, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, String encoding)
      Convenience constructor for Template(name, null, reader, cfg, encoding).
      Template(String name, String sourceCode, Configuration cfg)
      Convenience constructor for Template(name, new StringReader(reader), cfg).
      Template(String name, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg)
      Constructs a template from a character stream.
      Template(String name, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, ParserConfiguration customParserConfiguration, String encoding)
      Same as Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration, String), but also specifies a TemplateConfiguration.
      Template(String name, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, ParserConfiguration customParserConfiguration, String encoding, InputStream streamToUnmarkWhenEncEstabd)
      Same as Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration, ParserConfiguration, String), but allows specifying the streamToUnmarkWhenEncEstabd InputStream.
      Template(String name, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, String encoding)
      Same as Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration), but also specifies the template's encoding (not recommended).

    • Uses of Configuration in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration TemplateResolver.getConfiguration() 
      Configuration TemplateConfigurationFactory.getConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration this object belongs to, or null if it isn't yet bound to a Configuration.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver with parameters of type Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TemplateConfigurationFactory.setConfiguration(Configuration cfg)
      Binds this TemplateConfigurationFactory to a Configuration.
      protected abstract void TemplateConfigurationFactory.setConfigurationOfChildren(Configuration cfg)
      Calls TemplateConfiguration.setParentConfiguration(Configuration) on each enclosed TemplateConfiguration and TemplateConfigurationFactory.setConfiguration(Configuration) on each enclosed TemplateConfigurationFactory objects.
      protected void MergingTemplateConfigurationFactory.setConfigurationOfChildren(Configuration cfg) 
      protected void FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory.setConfigurationOfChildren(Configuration cfg) 
      protected void ConditionalTemplateConfigurationFactory.setConfigurationOfChildren(Configuration cfg) 
      Constructors in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver with parameters of type Configuration 
      Constructor and Description
      TemplateResolver(Configuration configuration)

    • Uses of Configuration in org.apache.freemarker.servlet

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.servlet that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Configuration FreemarkerServlet.createConfiguration()
      Creates the FreeMarker Configuration singleton and (when overidden) maybe sets its defaults.
      protected Configuration FreemarkerServlet.getConfiguration()
      Returns the Configuration object used by this servlet.
